document.full_text: any fundamental restructuring of greece's us$350bn of outstanding debt before june 2013 will have severe repercussions across the eurozone, according to the lawyer who advised uruguay on the successful restructuring of its sovereign debt in 2003.
document.title: ifr: voluntary greek debt restructuring in next 2 yrs: expert
lines_and_colors: any fundamental restructuring of greece's us$350bn of outstanding debt before june 2013 will have severe repercussions across the eurozone, according to the lawyer who advised uruguay on the successful restructuring of its sovereign debt in 2003.
